comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content: The opening by the Governor of Tanganyika, H E Sir  Richard Turnbull, KCMG, of the new water supply system for Dar es Salaam at the Ruvu river, 30 May 1959.  Picture shows the settling tanks at the treatment works, with Lady Turnbull and the Director of Public Works, Mr F H Woodrow,OBE, on the inspection walkway.
